Field Description: Name of the organisation that is the asset owner and if not the owner the main user of the asset.
Schema Data Rules Comment: Name of the Organisation's area coverage

Field Description: A unique code to identify the asset owning/using organisation.   For LAs this can be the URI from Open Data Communities.
Date at which the information provided is true.  This field contains the publication date.
Schema Data Rules Comment: Include this field to show the publication date of the dataset (ie. the date on which the dataset's information is true).

Field Description: TRUE where the data is the latest for the indicator.  Else blank
Dataset time period start, or start of accounting/reporting period.  DurationFrom will always include a Time of 00:00:00.
Schema Data Rules Comment: Dataset time period start, or start of accounting/reporting period.  DurationFrom will always include a Time of 00:00:00.

Field Description: Dataset time period end, or end of accounting/reporting period.  DurationTo will always include a Time of 23:59:59
Schema Data Rules Comment: Dataset time period end, or end of accounting/reporting period.  DurationTo will always include a Time of 23:59:59

Field Description: The type of time period the data record covers (eg. Financial Year, Calendar Year, Month, Quarter)
Schema Data Rules Comment: The type of time period the data record covers (eg. Financial Year, Calendar Year, Month, Quarter)
Example: eg. Financial Year, Calendar Year, Month, Quarter

Field Description: The unique reference number of the historic environment feature
Secondary reference number of the historic environment feature
Schema Data Rules Comment: Historic referencing system for historic environment features - still in use

Field Description: The name of the historic environment feature
Specific monument types assigned to the historic environment feature
Schema Data Rules Comment: The individual feature types assigned to each record, eg. Round Barrow, Castle, Artefact Scatter, etc.
The easting half of the historic environment feature's recorded location
The northing half of the historic environment feature's recorded location
